abstract: Letter from New York City Police Commissioner William J Bratton comments on March 11 article about complaints against police officers filed with city's Police Dept and with Civilian Complaint Review Board.
lead_paragraph: William J. Bratton, the New York City police commissioner, says statistics that seem puzzling can be easily explained.
snippet: William J. Bratton, the New York City police commissioner, says statistics that seem puzzling can be easily explained.
